body.name: Pour Over Coffee Dripper, Reusable Stainless Steel Pour Over Coffee Filters, Easy to Clean Camping Coffee Filter, Portable Collapsible Coffee Maker, Paperless Travel Coffee Makers
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 22 mins
features: Good Taste: If you like the original flavor of coffee, our pour over coffee dripper use double-layer micro mesh design can make the whole flavor of the coffee powder come out, you just need slowly pour hot water and you will get a cup of fresh hand-brewed coffee. The aroma will fill the house and a wonderful day starts with a delicious cup of coffee.

Portable Design: Our pour over coffee maker with unique collapsible arm design, high-quality double-layer mesh, easy to carry whether you use it at home, office or even you go camping or traveling. The unfold size of the holder is up to 4.5 inches in diameter, suitable with most of cups, coffee mugs, glasses, etc.

Eco-friendly: Our paperless coffee filter made of 304 stainless steel and ABS&PP safety material durable and reusable, no more disposable paper filters, it can be washed and reused for many times. By using this reusable coffee filters, you can save money, resources, and the environment, it’s not only good for you, but also for our planet.

Easy to Use：Our pour-over coffee filter fits multiple coffee mugs. You just need to open up the foldable arms and put it into your coffee cup, pour in the coffee powder or tea leaves, slowly pour hot water and wait for few minutes, then enjoy your cup of coffee or tea.
Good Service: If you have question or any problem about the product, please feel free to contact us, we provide 24-hour caring service

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AnnYun Portable and Reusable Coffee Filter You are a coffee lover who enjoys a cup of rich black coffee every morning . You know that different coffee filters can affect the flavor and mouthfeel of coffee, so you are always looking for the best one for you. And we offer you this portable and reusable coffee filter, so you can easily make wonderful coffee while you are in office home or outside hiking & traveling . Do you like coffee, but worry about the waste and pollution caused by coffee filters? If so, you will be interested in our portable and reusable coffee filter. This coffee filter is made of stainless steel, and can easily fit on your cup, allowing you to enjoy fresh coffee anytime, anywhere. The pore size design can ensure the aroma and taste of coffee, while filtering out the coffee grounds. It is also easy to clean, just rinse with water. By using this coffee filter, you can not only save money, but also reduce the impact on the environment, making your coffee more reassuring and delicious.

Easy to Clean The high-quality of 304 stainless steel and ABS & PP material made the coffee filter durable and reusable. When you are done to using it , just wash it and let it dry naturally, very convenient and saving your time as well. Fit with Multiple cups The unfold size of the holder is up to 4.5 inches in diameter, it fits multiple coffee mugs. You just need to open-up the foldable arms and put it into your coffee cup & glasses ,pour in the coffee powder or tea leaves, slowly pour hot water and wait for few minutes, then enjoy your cup of coffee or tea. Different using scenes This portable coffee filter is small and compact ,the unique collapsible arm design, high-quality double-layer mesh, easy to carry whether you use it at home, office or or even you go camping or traveling. It's also could be a good gift choice for your friend who loves coffee too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So simole. So easy to clean. Such great coffee. What is not to like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not as clean to use as expected, but works fine nonetheless.
reviews.reviewText: Thinking that I was saving money, I mistakenly bought a keg of Maxwell House GROUND coffee instead of the little jar of INSTANT. OOPS. But once opened and confirmed that I messed up, I wondered if there was a way to use the coffee rather than just throw it away.Since we only drink 1-2 cups at a time, this product was the answer. The coffee making steps are even the same. Put sugar in cup. Put the filter on top of the cup. Put coffee in filter and pour.Just pour SLOWLY. I found that if you pour too much, too soon... the grounds float a little and leave a ring around the top of the cup. The filter and the cup are really easy to clean afterwards, presuming that you don't let the grounds dry. I haven't tried letting them dry, to see how difficult that would make cleaning, but I would imagine added difficulty.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works just fine
reviews.reviewText: It’s a slow drip. May take a minute or two for coffee to filter through

reviews.reviewText: Live this guy filter pretty fine takes a 2 min longer to make coffee than drip tastes a bit stronger with 15% less coffee 4 small spoon full for 10 oz of coffee the little flaps fold away love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Served its purpose
reviews.reviewText: We went camping and wanted to make sure I could still make my favorite coffee. This product served its purpose well. I had to use it with a disposable filter just so it would be easier to clean the unit after use.
